p: In a recent experiment in-vitro, OSCN âˆ’ produced by the oxidase/LPO/H 2O 2/thiocyanate system rapidly and effectively inactivated A/swine/Illinois/02860/09 (swH1N2) influenza A virions, successfully preventing the infection of both primary human and male Sprague-Dawley rat trachea-bronchial epithelial cells ( Gingerich et al., 2016).
